TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CssStyleCollection extends System.Object

summary.span: 包含指定 HTML 服务器控件的 HTML 级联式样式表 (CSS) 内嵌样式特性。

span.span: Contains the HTML cascading-style sheets (CSS) inline style attributes for a specified HTML server control.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当对包含 Web 窗体页进行分析时，为特定 HTML 服务器控件声明的任何样式将添加到集合中。Any style declared for a particular HTML server control is added to the collection when the containing Web Forms page is parsed. 它通过字典模式 API 自动分析和公开 CSS 属性。It automatically parses and exposes CSS properties through a dictionary pattern API. 您可以通过属性操作服务器控件上的任何 CSS 属性 。You can manipulate any CSS property on a server control through the property. 只需使用索引集合中的 CSS 属性的键和值。Simply use the CSS property's key and value in the indexed collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将循环访问 服务器控件的对象。The following code example iterates through the object for an server control. 属性用于确定已在服务器控件上声明了哪些样式属性，然后将属性名称和值绑定到 Web 窗体页上的对象。The property is used to determine which style attributes have been declared on the server control, and then binds the attribute names and values to a object on the Web Forms page. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.CssStyleCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.CssStyleCollection/CS/css1.cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.CssStyleCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.CssStyleCollection/VB/css1.vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 将样式项添加到控件的 中。

span.span: Adds a style item to the of a control.

summary.span: 使用指定的名称/值对将样式项添加到控件的 。

span.span: Adds a style item to the of a control using the specified name/value pair.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要添加的样式项存在于 枚举中，请使用采用参数的方法的重载， 因为它是强类型的。If the style item to add exists in the enumeration, use the overload of the method that takes an parameter because it is strongly typed. 这意味着，在通过属性的 get 访问器查看项时，将包含添加的项 。This means that items that are added will be included when viewing items with the get accessor of the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法的两个重载以 编程方式向、 和控件添加级联样式表 。The following code example demonstrates how to use both overloads of the method to add a cascading style sheet to an , , and a control programmatically. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic CssStyleCollection.Add Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CssStyleCollection.Add Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic CssStyleCollection.Add Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CssStyleCollection.Add Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Adds a style item to the collection of a control using the specified enumeration value and corresponding value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要添加的样式项存在于 枚举中，请使用方法的此重载，而不是使用不 带参数的重载 。If the style item to add exists in the enumeration, use this overload of the method rather than the overload that does not take an parameter. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法的两个重载以 编程方式向、 和控件添加级联样式表 。The following code example demonstrates how to use both overloads of the method to add a cascading style sheet to an , , and a control programmatically. remarks.format: ## Remarks 以编程方式添加到 具有属性的控件的集合的样式项 或 采用作为输入的枚举值的方法的样式项 将包含在与属性一起返回的样式项的计数中， 并包含在使用属性返回的字符串文本中 。Style items that are added programmatically to a collection for a control with the property or the method that take an enumeration value as an input are included in the count of style items that are returned with the property and are included with the string literal that is returned with the property. 这些属性为强类型。These attributes are strongly typed. 如果要添加到服务器控件的级联样式表属性存在于 枚举中，请使用这些强类型化方法。If the cascading style sheet attribute that you want to add to a server control exists in the enumeration, use these strongly typed methods. 如果要添加的属性在枚举中不存在 ，请使用 属性或 方法。If the attribute you want to add does not exist in the enumeration, use the property or the method. 尝试访问尚未 添加的控件的中的枚举值 ，或访问已使用该属性或方法添加的 CSS 特性后 ，将 `null` 使用属性返回 。Trying to access an enumeration value in the of a control that has not been added or to access a CSS attribute that has been added with the property or the method, returns `null` using the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 属性返回在控件上设置的样式的值 。The following code example uses the property to return the value of a style that is set on a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic CssStyleCollection.this Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CssStyleCollection.this Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic CssStyleCollection.this Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CssStyleCollection.this Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]
